Language Services for Professionals
Welcome
Tell Me More

Services

Translation

Do you need a text in Spanish, English or Japanese? We have a decade of experience translating academic, business, educational and technical texts.

Copy-editing

We have helped leading intellectuals and professionals get their educational and technical ideas to the world, concisely and beautifully.

Consulting

When your success depends on communicating effectively, culture and language matter. We can help you make connections across languages and values beyond the text.

How It Works

  • Get In Touch

    Drop us a line! We will reply within two business days with some questions. Your answers will help us create a formal quotation tailored to your needs.

  • Request a Quotation

    After we receive your answers, we will reply within two business days with a formal quotation. Find out more about our fees.

  • Hire Our Services

    Let us know that you accept the quotation. We will send you a job contract within two business days.

  • Sign the Contract

    E-mail to us a signed copy of the job contract. We will start working on your text right away! If we have any important questions, we will contact you.

  • Delivery
    of the final
    text!

Pricing

All services require a minimum charge of 4,000 yen.
